title: Flight Delays for Prospective Hajj Pilgrims Repeatedly - Kompas.id
text: [›](/) [English](/kategori/english)›Flight Delays for Prospective ... Flight Delays for Prospective Hajj Pilgrims Repeatedly The departure of prospective Indonesian pilgrims from the Donohudan Embarkation, Solo, was several hours late. About AI Translated Article Please note that this article was automatically translated using Microsoft Azure AI, Open AI, and Google Translation AI. We cannot ensure that the entire content is translated accurately. If you spot any errors or inconsistencies, contact us at [hotline@kompas.id](mailto:hotline@kompas.id), and we'll make every effort to address them. Thank you for your understanding. MEKKAH, KOMPAS - The delay of departure for Indonesian hajj pilgrims has occurred once again. The departure of Indonesian hajj pilgrims who are part of the flying group or Kloter 41 Donohudan Embarkation (SOC-41) has been postponed due to aircraft engine damage of Garuda Indonesia. The SOC-41 flight crew was supposed to depart at 07.40 western Indonesian time (WIB). At that time, the congregation was already at the fast track location at Adi Soemarmo Airport, Boyolali Regency, Central Java. Because the plane had engine failure and it was estimated that repairs would take a long time, the prospective Hajj pilgrims were returned to the Hajj dormitory.
